sentences.en: L 'é criture fut la seule chose à la hauteur de cette catastrophe d'enfant.
sentences.cn: 写作是这不幸的孩子唯一能做的事情.

sentences.en: Once, she had been put off by his hauteur.
sentences.cn: 她曾经对他的傲慢很反感。

sentences.en: The intense vitality that had been so remarkable in the garage was converted into impressive hauteur.
sentences.cn: 先前她在车行里的那种旺盛的活力,转眼间变成了一种明显的骄傲情绪.
